alert.note: Alert for Mariposa; Merced (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 18 at 8:33PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by other multiple causes continues. * WHERE...A portion of central California, including the following counties, Mariposa and Merced. * WHEN...Until 900 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Several structures are flooded and some sand bagging operations are continuing. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 832 PM PST, Long duration flooding is occuring due to recent heavy rainfall. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Merced, Atwater, Planada and Le Grand. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
